Text.Page:
The Cyanocannon Foundry is under attack by athakela hunters. We can't afford to lose the foundry.

Intercept those argons at once!
Excellent timing. After the argons hit our foundry at Magthulk Crater, I feared we'd be the next target.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Are you all right?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Bah! It'll take more than a few scratches to fell me.

What's this? It's not mine. Someone around {@Rgn:78001} must miss it. See if you can find the owner.
